descriptions.title: Concluding Ritual
descriptions.content:
Description

This refers to the concluding portion of a ritual (note: Bod rgya tshig mdzod chen mo: dkyil 'khor gyi rjes kyi cho ga ste/ cho ga lhag chad kyi nyes pa zhi ba dang lha tshim pa'i phyir zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg bya ba dang/ dkyil 'khor mchod bstod dang phyogs skyong la gtor ma dbul ba dang/ dkyil 'khor la phyag byas te bzod gsol bya ba dang/ ye shes pa gshegs nas dam tshig pa rang la bsdus te rdul tshon chur gshegs dang/ dge bsngo dang bkra shis kyis mtha' brgyan par bya ba'o/).
